mapper.sql: t.id, t.item_no, t.item_name, t.credit_type, t.principal_balance, t.interest, t.total_interest, t.guarantor, t.pledge, t.litigation_stage, t.pledge_sequence, t.check_time_warning, t.important_time_warning, t.expected_amount_of_payment, t.expected_return_time, t.quasi_disposal_mode, t.remark, t.agent, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.remarks, t.del_flag
